alert.note: Alert for Merrick; Nance; Polk (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 12 at 3:26PM CDT until May 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Nance County in central Nebraska... Northeastern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Central Polk County in east central Nebraska... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Osceola, or 18 miles southwest of Columbus, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Silver Creek around 335 PM CDT. Genoa around 345 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
